name: Soul Protector
description:
Soul Protector is a endless top down shooter in which you are protecting a knight from demons that want to destroy his soul, you will follow him through out his endless journey, along the way you will find many helpfull power ups that may save you from a near death scenario

This game was created for week 139 of weekly game jam

This time i wanted to make a top down shooter, but i wanted to make it unique, so i ended up making a mix between top down shooter and endless runer, Also this was first jam game that i collabed on and finished, which was a new expiriance for me

Known Issues:

In web build some players may be unable to see and use leaderboard, using windows build helps with this issue

Credits
  • Game Design - NoelOskar
  • Scripts - NoelOskar
  • Art - NoelOskar
  • Sound - BONGOD
  • Music - BONGOD

Game uses free online leaderboard system provided by http://dreamlo.com/
